Odeinoichus,"2017-05-20T17:06:32.263Z","Not terrible, limited uses.","

Set #30034 Tow-Truck: Another LEGO Racers Polybag to discuss, is this one worth tracking down? Read on to find out.
Pros:

column2: Model is fast and easy to build, quick pick up and play set.
Tow-Truck design is streamlined and works as a micro-scaled model.
Price-per-piece ratio favorable upon initial release date.

column1: Cons:

column2: Almost juniorized build techniques used here, due to the nature of the simple and quick build of the model.
Finished model may not be to everyone’s tastes, looks good, but could be mistaken for a Tow Car instead of an actual truck.

column1: Overall opinion

LEGO Racers is a Theme I’m not 100% familiar with, but I do know that they were and are predominantly meant for quick and easy play. I recommend this set as a good one for kids, it’s fun and fast to build and can be played with for hours without any real issues. As far as older fans are concerned, it’s a must-have for Polybag completists, but casual Polybag collectors who prefer sticking with certain Themes can safely skip it.
